sqlMap.procedure:
SELECT OPRAT_CODE /*운행코드*/, TRAIN_NO /*열차번호*/, TRAIN_KND_VALUE /*열차종류코드 값*/, START_STATN_VALUE /*출발역코드 값*/, ARVL_STATN_VALUE /*도착역코드 값*/, TO_CHAR(START_TM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_TM /*출발시각*/, TO_CHAR(ARVL_TM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ARVL_TM /*도착시각*/, ROUTE_VALUE /*노선코드 값*/, DISTNC /*거리*/, FARE /*요금*/, REGISTER /*등록자*/, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS RGSDE /*등록일*/, NVL(UPDUSR, '--') AS UPDUSR /*수정자*/, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDDE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '--') AS UPDDE /*수정일*/ FROM TABLE( PK_ADMIN_OPRAT.FN_SLT_OPRAT(#srcType,mode=IN#, #srcText,mode=IN#, #code,mode=IN#) )
/********************************************************** * 이름 : FN_SLT_OPRAT * 설명 : 운행일정 조회 함수 * 파라미터 : 열차종류, 열차번호, 운행코드 **********************************************************/

SELECT OPRAT_CODE /*운행코드*/, TRAIN_CODE /*열차코드*/, TRAIN_NO /*열차번호*/, TRAIN_KND_CODE /*열차종류코드*/, TRAIN_KND_VALUE /*열차종류코드 값*/, START_STATN_CODE /*출발역코드*/, START_STATN_VALUE /*출발역코드 값*/, ARVL_STATN_CODE /*도착역코드*/, ARVL_STATN_VALUE /*도착역코드 값*/, TO_CHAR(START_TM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS START_TM /*출발시각*/, TO_CHAR(ARVL_TM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS ARVL_TM /*도착시각*/, ROUTE_CODE /*노선코드*/, ROUTE_VALUE /*노선코드 값*/, DISTNC /*거리*/, FARE /*요금*/, REGISTER /*등록자*/, TO_CHAR(RGSDE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS RGSDE /*등록일*/, NVL(UPDUSR, '--') AS UPDUSR /*수정자*/, NVL(TO_CHAR(UPDDE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '--') AS UPDDE /*수정일*/ FROM TABLE( PK_ADMIN_OPRAT.FN_SLT_OPRAT(#srcType,mode=IN#, #srcText,mode=IN#, #code,mode=IN#) )
/********************************************************** * 이름 : FN_SLT_OPRAT * 설명 : 운행일정 조회 함수 * 파라미터 : 열차종류, 열차번호, 운행코드 **********************************************************/
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO OPRAT( OPRAT_CODE /*운행코드*/, TRAIN_CODE /*열차코드*/, START_STATN /*출발역*/, START_TM /*출발시각*/, ARVL_STATN /*도착역*/, ARVL_TM /*도착시각*/, ROUTE_CODE /*노선*/, DISTNC /*거리*/, FARE /*요금*/, REGISTER /*등록자*/, RGSDE /*등록일*/ ) VALUES( ( SELECT 'OPRAT_CODE_'|| NVL( MAX( REGEXP_SUBSTR(OPRAT_CODE, '[^_]+', 1, 3)+1 ), 1 ) FROM OPRAT ), #trainCode#, #startStatnCode#, TO_DATE(#startTm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #arvlStatnCode#, TO_DATE(#arvlTm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #routeCode#, TO_NUMBER(#distnc#), TO_NUMBER(#fare#), #register#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE OPRAT SET TRAIN_CODE = #trainCode#, START_STATN = #startStatnCode#, START_TM = TO_DATE(#startTm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), ARVL_STATN = #arvlStatnCode#, ARVL_TM = TO_DATE(#arvlTm#, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), ROUTE_CODE = #routeCode#, DISTNC = TO_NUMBER(#distnc#), FARE = TO_NUMBER(#fare#), UPDUSR = #updUsr#, UPDDE = SYSDATE WHERE OPRAT_CODE = #opratCode#
